title: System Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Museum Exhibition Techniques Through Arts-Based Inquiry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of art history and museology, with experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply methodologies for the artistic reinterpretation of everyday objects in museum exhibition design.
Learners can design educational programs utilizing polyphonic (multi-interpretive) exhibition techniques.
Learners can develop exhibition concepts reflecting personal experiences through arts-based inquiry learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
